changeSet.author: jdavid
jdavid
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`casefile_casebundling` ( `casebundling_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `casefile_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`casebundling_id`,`casefile_id`), KEY `FKcasefilecasebundling_casebundling` (`casebundling_id`), KEY `FKcasefilecasebundling_casefile` (`casefile_id`), CONSTRAINT `FKcasefilecasebundling_casebundling` FOREIGN KEY (`casebundling_id`) REFERENCES `casebundling` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FKcasefilecasebundling_casefile` FOREIGN KEY (`casefile_id`) REFERENCES `casefile` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
